resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:aspect:showcase/1002</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>aspect:showcase/1002</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Termodinamika</string>
            <string language="en">Thermodynamics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thermodynamik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Thermodynamique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Thermodynamics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Termodinamica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θερμοδυναμική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Termodinámica</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Tečaj obsega celotno termodinamiko za srednješole. Vsebuje poglavja: uvod v termodinamiko, pritisk, temperatura, notranja energija, toplota, delo, prvi zakon termodinamike, entropija, porazdelitev hitrosti, specifična toplota.</string>
            <string language="en">Course on Thermodynamics for Secondary School. It includes chapters: Introduction to Thermodynamics, Pressure, Temperature, Internal Energy, Heat, Work, First Law of Thermodynamics, Entropy, Velocity Distribution, Specific Heat.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizika</string>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">termodinamika</string>
            <string language="en">thermodynamics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">temperatura</string>
            <string language="en">temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">idealni plin</string>
            <string language="en">ideal gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">tlak</string>
            <string language="en">pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">notranja energija</string>
            <string language="en">internal energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">delo</string>
            <string language="en">work</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">toplotni stroj</string>
            <string language="en">heat engine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">aspect_showcase</string>
            <string language="en">aspect_showcase</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurs auf Thermodynamik für Sekundärschule. 
Sie schließt Kapitel ein: Einleitung in eine 
Thermodynamik, Druck, Temperatur, interne Energie, Hitze, Arbeit, 
erstes Gesetz von Thermodynamik, Entropie, Geschwindigkeit Verteilung,
spezifische Hitze.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cours sur la thermodynamique pour l'école 
secondaire. Elle inclut des chapitres : Introduction à la
thermodynamique, pression, la température, énergie interne, la 
chaleur, travail, première loi de la thermodynamique, entropie, 
distribution de vitesse, la chaleur spécifique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Curso no thermodynamics para a escola secundária.
Inclui capítulos: Introdução ao thermodynamics, 
pressão, temperatura, energia interna, calor, trabalho, primeira lei 
do thermodynamics, entropia, distribuição da velocidade, calor 
específico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corso su termodinamica per la scuola secondaria. 
Include i capitoli: Introduzione a termodinamica, 
pressione, temperatura, energia interna, calore, lavoro, prima legge 
di termodinamica, entropia, distribuzione di velocità, calore 
Specifico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σειρά μαθημάτων για τη θερμοδυναμική για τη 
δευτεροβάθμια εκπαίδευση. Περιλαμβάνει τα κεφάλαια: 
Εισαγωγή στη θερμοδυναμική, πίεση, θερμοκρασία, εσωτερική 
ενέργεια, θερμότητα, εργασία, πρώτος νόμος της θερμοδυναμικής, 
εντροπία, διανομή ταχύτητας, συγκεκριμένη θερμότητα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Curso en la termodinámica para la escuela 
secundaria. Incluye los capítulos: Introducción a la 
termodinámica, presión, temperatura, energía interna, calor, 
trabajo, primera ley de la termodinámica, entropía, distribución de
la velocidad, calor específico.</string>
          </description>
